Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='SG85')

BibliographicData.Title: Longitudinal topography and interdigitation of corticostriatal projections in the rhesus monkey.

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin
